categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Turrant was a Human male captain who served in the Imperial Army some time before the Galactic Civil War.

The officer was stationed in a settlement on the Corellian moon of Gus Talon. During the attempted arrest of a local Rebel cell led by Rallo, Turrant called for reinforcements from his superiors. In response to this, the Galactic Empire completely bombarded the town.
